title: New Beta Client wont even start [Yes another one]
body:
So, I've downloaded the new alpha client perfectly fine.
But when I click Launch on the LoL launcher:
http://prntscr.com/d8kay5
No screen is showed up whatsoever. 
I tried running the launcher in my C:\Riot Games\LeagueOfLegends folder
(LeaugeClient.exe, http://prntscr.com/d8kbli)
And it didn't show up. There is a process started tho. Whichs freezes
at about 20k - 30k memory usage.

Would like help :)

replies.body:
It sounds like your computer may be experiencing issues connecting to our login servers. Since this is often impacted by certain network settings, I'd like you to  work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if this caused any noticeable change.

I've ran the Hextech repair tool. Seems to be nothing with my Internet connection...
I'll just give up for now and we'll see later :)
The HRT should be a last step, actually. Did you try all the other steps listed in that guide?
